name: Yuri Nation
blurb: Yuri Nation is an action adventure game for PC, Mac & Linux where you play as Yuri, a dog who must pee on things to grow his territory.

rewards.reward: COULD NOT HOLD IT ANY LONGER - Early Bird Special for the $15 Tier
RELIEF - ONE digital download of the GAME for PC, Mac or Linux. Early access to the BETA and private development FORUMS.
BARK- Digital download of complete game SOUNDTRACK, exclusive Kickstarter WALLPAPER with an EXTRA COPY of Yuri Nation for a friend - plus previous tier.

The DOG SHOW - Exclusive kickstarter in-game DOG that proves to your friends that you support Yuri Nation.  We will also thank you by listing your name in the IN-GAME CREDITS and provide you a digital download of YURI NATION ART BOOK - plus all previous tiers.
NICE COAT - The exclusive Yuri Nation Kickstarter T-SHIRT and BUMPERSTICKER to show off your support for responsible Yuri Nation - plus all previous tiers.
The BONE COLLECTOR - Signed High Quality 8x10 inch ART PRINT - plus all previous tiers.
THE ACCIDENT - Early Bird special of the $125 tier.

BE ONE WITH THE PACK - Printed and Autographed COMIC BOOK, a 24x36 inch POSTER autographed by the whole development team - plus all previous tiers with a total of 3 COPIES of Yuri Nation for you and your friends.
BEST IN SHOW - Our biggest autographed and numbered limited edition 16x20 inch ART PRINT - plus all previous tiers.

MUZZLE LOADER - Kickstarter only Yuri Nation FROSTED GLASS to help with the art of refueling and access to the game at ALPHA stage - plus all previous tiers with a total of 5 COPIES of Yuri Nation for you and your friends.

HELP US BUILD A NATION - Impress your friends with hot REAL ESTATE in Yuri Nation.  Send us a picture of your house and we will model it in game.  We will also give you a PHYSICAL YARD SIGN to connect the two universes.  All backers giving $250 or more will also get the special DEVELOPMENT TEAM T-SHIRT - plus all previous tiers.
MAKE YOUR MARK - Early Bird special of the $500 tier.

IMMORTALIZE YOUR DOG - Send us a picture of YOUR DOG or PET and we will include them as a character in the game.  You will also get a special refueling station (YURI DOG BOWL) for your most loyal friend - plus all previous tiers with  a total of 8 COPIES of Yuri Nation for you, your dog, and all your other less loyal friends.

YURI NATION PASSPORT - Don't want your pet to be alone in Yuri Nation?  YOU too can be digitized by our artists and imortalized as a CHARACTER in Yuri Nation.  Just send us a picture or video of you or other humanoid friend that you want us to 3D model.  You will also get your own Yuri limited edition refueling canaster (BPA FREE ALUMINUM WATER BOTTLE) - plus all previous tiers.

GAME DESIGNER - Always wanted to be a game designer?  We will work with you to DESIGN YOUR VERY OWN LEVEL that features your Characters and Property from the previous tiers.  Maybe we can model the enviroment after your own NEIGHBORHOOD.  We will list you as a GAME DESIGNER in the game credits and send you a physcial TROPHY of apprieciation for your creation.  You will also get COPIES of ALL FUTURE Serotonin Studios games - plus all previous tiers.

CAN WE ALL MOVE TO YURI NATION? - If you feel this strongly about helping Yuri make it to the moon, we have a place for your whole family.  Send us pictures of everyone (up to 8 humaniods and 4 pets) and we will IMMORTALIZE them as CHARACTERS in Yuri Nation.  Don't forget, you will still also get to help us design a level so we will have no problem finding a place to put everyone.  We will list you as an EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in the game credits, have regular VOIP Conversations with you, and treat you as a permanent SEROTONIN STUDIOS VIP - plus all previous tiers with a total of 10 COPIES of Yuri Nation for you, your family, and friends.
